occupation: Chief Executive Officer at WetRentals Inc.
headline: CEO @ WetRentals & Full Stack Dev @ Solink
summary:
Purveyor of code, conqueror of bugs, and virtual puppeteer of automations - that's Nick Sutherland for you!

After years of tinkering with technology and mediating peace treaties between humans and machines, Nick's been known to add a dash of humour and wit to the oh-so-serious tech world. 

Nick's one of those rare unicorns who thrives at the crossroads of business and technology. Over the years, he's created, repaired, and sometimes even resurrected businesses, like some sort of tech-savvy phoenix. His arsenal? An uncanny ability to optimize operations, a knack for building sturdy support systems, and a heart that beats in Python and JS.

Not one to rest on his laurels, Nick's racked up experience with Fortune 500 companies, contracting in the trenches of support and web design. He's also championed the underdogs, implementing robust and affordable support systems for small and medium-sized businesses, and occasionally saving the day.

And if that wasn't enough, he's had his entrepreneurial hat on quite a few times. CellFurb, HQC International and WetRentals - just a handful of the successful ventures under his belt. Each one a testament to his unwavering dedication, business acumen, and (let's be honest) his stubborn refusal to settle for anything less than extraordinary.

Yes AI wrote this ü§ìü§£

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description:
Say hello to Solink, your very own digital watchdog and profit booster, all wrapped up in a convenient subscription-based service. We'r√•e not just about video surveillance; we're about transforming your security camera footage into a treasure trove of actionable insights.

Solink cleverly marries your POS data with your security footage, birthing a powerful tool that gives you a crystal-clear view of your operations. It's like being omnipresent without having to leave your desk!

Looking to bump up your profits? Our insights can guide you there. Troubled by theft? We'll help you put a lid on that. Want to reclaim your time from endless hours of scanning footage? Solink's got your back.

With Solink, you're not just subscribing to a service, you're investing in peace of mind, profitability, and a smarter way to run your business. So why wait? Come aboard the Solink ship and navigate your way to a more secure, profitable future!

experiences.title: Chief Executive Officer
experiences.description:
Welcome aboard WetRentals, your passport to a splashy adventure and a sea of opportunities! WetRentals isn't just another boat rental service; we're the bustling local marketplace that brings boat lovers and boat owners together.

Looking for a nautical joyride? We've got a flotilla of options waiting just for you. Got a boat sitting idle at the dock? Turn it into a source of passive income by listing it with us. We're all about making waves and money!

Navigating WetRentals is as easy as a summer breeze. Whether you're on a quest to find your perfect watercraft or looking to list your own vessel, we've streamlined the process to make it a splash.

So, dive into the WetRentals experience. Whether you're seeking thrills on the waves or a steady stream of income, we're the one-stop harbour for all your boating dreams. Get set to make a splash with WetRentals - where the fun never drains away!

experiences.title: Senior Information Officer
experiences.description:
I don't mean to brag, but when it comes to management, I've been at the very pinnacle. Directly liaising with the owner and investors, I was the guiding force behind the flourishing success of two thriving locations.

Think of me as the tech whisperer, breathing new life into tired systems. I've successfully overseen the migration from antiquated tech systems to state-of-the-art digital infrastructures, all while maintaining seamless operations.

Beyond the tech realm, I turned into an architectural maestro, designing, researching, and supervising the construction of an expansive second location. My role was part conductor, part orchestrator, ensuring every element harmonized to create a perfect symphony of growth.

But that's not all! As the guardian of customer satisfaction, I improved our support network leading to a remarkable surge of over 70% in customer happiness scores. After all, what's growth without satisfied customers cheering us on, right?

And my secret ingredient? A relentless passion for expansion. I've never stopped hunting for new opportunities to grow, to improve, and to push our boundaries.

From management to migration, from construction to customer satisfaction, I've donned many hats, each leaving an indelible mark on our growth story. Always at the helm, always pushing for more - that's been my journey at the top

experiences.title: Operations & Student
experiences.description:
Welcome to Genlaw - not just a band of trailblazers, but a revolution in the making, set to redefine the legal landscape. We're more than just an insurance company; we're a legal lifeline for businesses, providing unlimited law resources at a finger's snap.

How do we do it? Think of us as your trusty insurance company, but for legal needs. We collect a nominal monthly subscription fee and stand ready to unleash a world of legal support whenever you need it. Be it contracts, policies, or litigation - we've got your back.

But that's not all. We've harnessed the power of cutting-edge AI and machine learning to automate your legal needs. Our AI-powered virtuosos can whip up contracts and policies faster than you can say "Genlaw"! And to ensure these documents are bulletproof, they get the final stamp of approval from one of our skilled lawyers on retainer.

Genlaw is the future of legal services - efficient, affordable, and backed by state-of-the-art tech. All your legal needs tied up in one neat, cost-effective monthly package. So why play the waiting game? Join the Genlaw revolution today and redefine the way you handle your legal needs. We're Genlaw - legally cool, technologically advanced, and ready to serve you!

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description:
Welcome to the tale of CellFurb Inc., a brainchild of mine that turned into a nationwide sensation. Starting with a spark of an idea, CellFurb bloomed into a seven-branch strong empire, spreading its wings across the length and breadth of Canada. The crowning jewel of our network? A magnificent outpost in the picturesque Whistler, BC!

But what made CellFurb more than just another phone repair company? It was our unwavering commitment to quality. We didn't just fix phones, we breathed new life into them, with each repair backed by a lifetime warranty. Imagine that, a lifetime of peace of mind, one repair at a time!

Under my guidance, CellFurb was more than a business; it was a promise to every customer that walked through our doors - a promise of quality, durability, and a service that stood the test of time. So, here's to CellFurb, a testament to the magic that happens when technology meets trust!

experiences.title: General Manager & Owner
experiences.description:
Allow me to set the scene: SkyZone Ottawa, a business on the brink of flatlining, in desperate need of a tech intervention. Enter Nick, software superhero and business defibrillator, armed with cutting-edge software, robust support systems, and an unwavering commitment to resuscitation.

In a span of two months, I channelled my inner tech maestro to orchestrate a stunning revival of SkyZone Ottawa. We didn't just beat the odds; we gave the odds a run for their money! Our corporate report card went from flunking to honor roll status, boasting an impressive 50% leap.

But wait, there's more! With our shiny new systems humming away, sales didn't just inch up, they soared, marking a 15% uptick. And just to add a cherry on top of this success sundae, I also became a part-owner of the business.

In the grand epic of SkyZone Ottawa, this chapter was marked by the sweet symphony of reviving pixels, the dance of rising figures, and a whole lot of technological wizardry. And yours truly, both the conductor and part-owner, stood at the heart of it all!

experiences.title: Support Guru, Tier 2 and Theme Design
experiences.description:
Strum the harp, blow the trumpet, and let the confetti fly! Because Shopify has proudly clinched the top spot as the #1 Best Place to Work in Canada for 2017, as declared by Glassdoor. And guess what makes this accolade even sweeter? It's purely based on the rave reviews and glowing feedback from the people who know us best - our own Shopify family!

Why do our folks simply adore clocking in each day, you ask? Well, it's all about that magical trifecta of flexibility, autonomy, and meaningful impact. Our team members aren't just employees; they're craftspeople, constantly sharpening their skills while etching their unique imprints on the Shopify story.

We've woven a work culture that fosters freedom, empowers individuals, and deeply values the contributions of each member. And the result? A vibrant tapestry of happy, dedicated folks who are as excited about Mondays as they are about Fridays. At Shopify, we're not just a team. We're a family, a community, and sometimes even a rock band (office karaoke nights, anyone?). So, here's to creating a work paradise, one day at a time!

experiences.title: Lifeguard
experiences.description:
Meet your friendly neighborhood Aquaman! With a keen eye for health and safety guidelines, I've been the tireless captain of daily operations for our bustling wading pool program. Armed with a whistle and a deep sense of responsibility, I've moonlighted as a lifeguard, ensuring every splash made by the kiddos is safe and joyful.

But my job wasn't all about vigilance and rules. As the pied piper of fun, I orchestrated a symphony of games and activities, not just in the pool but also in the park area. Think of me as the conductor of joy, ensuring each day is a new adventure for our little visitors, both on dry land and in the shimmering water.

From pool noodles to sand castles, from Marco Polo to a friendly game of catch, every day has been a unique tapestry of laughter, learning, and lots (and lots!) of splashing. Ensuring safety while delivering fun ‚Äì that's been my daily dive into this role!

experiences.title: Founder and CEO
experiences.description:
Drumroll, please! Let us introduce you to HQC International Inc., a trailblazer in the electronics market, serving up high-quality parts and devices from the heart of Ottawa, Canada to every corner of the globe. From wholesale wizards to retail rangers, we've got everyone's electronic needs covered.

The brainchild of the visionary Nick Sutherland, HQC International Inc. kicked off as a solo act. But the band wasn't complete until Derek Hollingworth jumped aboard the tech train, helping morph HQC into the global force it is today. We're not just a company, we're a tech duet belting out a melody of quality and reliability.

Curious to learn more? Of course you are! Plug into our world and get the lowdown on everything HQC at http://ShopHQC.com. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a gadget guru, or just someone who appreciates quality electronics, our cyber doors are always open. Welcome to the HQC family, where tech dreams come true!

accomplishment_publications.name: Interview With Nick Sutherland of CellFurb.com

volunteer_work.title: Founder
volunteer_work.description:
Hello, sock-starved world! Let us introduce you to the Red Socks Charity, your friendly neighbourhood sock fairies! Our mission? Socking it to the lack of...well, socks!

We at Red Socks Charity have unravelled an often overlooked fact - socks are among the top items craved by shelters and organizations assisting the homeless, those at risk, and anyone needing a bit of help. And we're ready to pull our socks up and do something about it!

In our quest to warm every cold foot, we've partnered with a fantastic company, adding a dash of sock to their premises. Look out for our special sock donation bin tucked away in their location.

Donating to Red Socks is a clean affair - your gently worn foot-covers will enjoy a rejuvenating industrial wash before they're redistributed to local shelters and schools. Picture a day without socks - not a pretty image, right? Cold toes, discomfort, even pain. And that's what we're trying to fix.

The bitter truth is, the world needs socks, and currently, there's a serious sock-shortage in donations. So, it's time to turn the tide!

If you're wondering how to join this sock revolution, it's as simple as liking our Facebook page and sharing our website. Spread the sock love! And remember, your time, your shares, your donations, they all make a difference. Thank you for standing toe-to-toe with us in this mission.

Let's sock it to 'em, with Red Socks Charity!

volunteer_work.title: Executive Director
volunteer_work.description:
Introducing the Whistler's Tonnie Tuesday - a weekly 50/50 draw that makes every other Tuesday pale in comparison! Join in and you could be shimmying away with up to a whopping $10,000. That's right - enough dough to make even a baker blush!

The best part? The more, the merrier (and richer)! The more folks jump into this fun-filled lottery, the fatter the prize pool. So shout it from the rooftops, text your friends, spam your group chats - because their involvement could be your ticket to the big win!

Each week, we stir the pot of fortune - sometimes, one lucky winner gets the whole enchilada, a whole 50% of the prize pool. Other times, we split the bounty, gifting two fortunate souls a neat 25% each. We're big believers in sharing the joy!

But remember, even if Lady Luck doesn't give you a wink, there's still a silver lining. The other 50% of the winnings goes straight into making Whistler a better place, benefiting local non-profit organizations. It's a win-win, really - you're either rolling in dough or rolling up your sleeves for a good cause!

So, what are you waiting for? Put your luck to the test this Tonnie Tuesday. Join the Whistler Lotto, and let's make some winners!
